channel.title: My menu is backwards.... -_-
channel.description:
Ok so i just started coding html and CSS and i was wondering, why is this happening?? [IMG]http://i1062.photobucket.com/albums/t499/202685/sdfgh.png[/img] when my html code is the other way around?? [code=html4strict]
  • Home
  • Contact
    • [/code] ?? idk if it matters but heres my CSS code [code=css]#menu ul {float:right;display:block;padding:0px;margin:0px;text-alaign:right;} #menu ul li {float:right;display:inline;margin:0px;list-style:none;border:1px solid #333;background-color:#CCC;padding:1px;} #menu a {float:right;padding: 0px 20px;text-decoration:none;color:#666;border:1px solid #333;} #menu a:hover {float:right;background-color:#999;border:1px solid #333;color:#666;[/code] any ideas??

item.title: My menu is backwards.... -_-
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

I was under the impression of why Home and Contact were switched around from left-to-right. If you want to do that, apply only the float:right to the ul.

Read full topic

item.title: My menu is backwards.... -_-
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:6, topic:444566”][quote author=ravekitty link=topic=547251.msg4016466#msg4016466 date=1339684159]

my guess would be that

#menu ul li {[size=36pt]float:right;[/size]display:inline;margin:0px;list-style:none;border:1px solid #333;background-color:#CCC;padding:1px;}

should be

#menu ul li {[size=36pt]float:left;[/size]display:inline;margin:0px;list-style:none;border:1px solid #333;background-color:#CCC;padding:1px;}

-_- how did i miss that… thanks

I still don’t see the difference lol =p
[/quote][/quote]
Lmao.

Read full topic

item.title: My menu is backwards.... -_-
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

Ok so i just started coding html and CSS and i was wondering, why is this happening??

when my html code is the other way around??

[code=html4strict]

  • Home
  • Contact
    • [/code] ??

    idk if it matters but heres my CSS code

    #menu ul {float:right;display:block;padding:0px;margin:0px;text-alaign:right;} #menu ul li {float:right;display:inline;margin:0px;list-style:none;border:1px solid #333;background-color:#CCC;padding:1px;} #menu a {float:right;padding: 0px 20px;text-decoration:none;color:#666;border:1px solid #333;} #menu a:hover {float:right;background-color:#999;border:1px solid #333;color:#666;

    any ideas??
